metadata.name: Aequilibrium
metadata.description:
2019

Here we are
embrace your soul,
in this
storm of disorder.
Wrapped up
from the chaos of loneliness,
we hide
the stillness and calm.

The reading of the image is circular and focuses on the central figure represented by the eternal and sinful love of Paolo and Francesca di Dante. the two anthropomorphic figures in suits and ties try to maintain the order represented by the stairs. Some references to the current generation, with extreme tendencies, from selfies in communion to fun with drugs refer to the work: "The Raft of the Medusa". Below, we note Mickey Mouse, pleased by the vision of a crime scene, to understand that it was capitalism, something invented by us and which is actually not tangible to kill what was a man. The tattoos reported by each individual are primitive symbols with no meaning other than that of presence: they represent Homo Sapiens. The white undergarments are the modesty we keep within us. Participants were chosen through a call via social networks.
